Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 14 Saraṇaduka, Tika » 14.12 Saraṇaduka, Parittattika » 14.12.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Saraṇaduka, Tika
Saraṇaduka, Parittattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
42.
2685Saraṇaṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
2686Araṇaṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2687Saraṇaṃ parittañca araṇaṃ parittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2688Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
43.
2689Araṇaṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2690Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
44.
2691Araṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2692Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2693(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
